thing-type.label: VehicleControlUnit
thing-type.description: This Object provides the information to represent a generic VCU(vehicle control unit).

channel-type.label: Vehicle UI State
channel-type.description: The UI state of the vehicle. 0: idle 1: driving 2: charging 3: limp-home 4-15: reserved for future use

channel-type.label: Vehicle Speed
channel-type.description: Current speed of the vehicle.

channel-type.label: Vehicle Shift Status
channel-type.description: Current shift status of the vehicle. 0: Neutral 1: Forward 2: Reverse

channel-type.label: Vehicle AP Position
channel-type.description: Current position of the accelerator pedal.

channel-type.label: Vehicle Power
channel-type.description: Current power of drive output/regenerative braking.

channel-type.label: Vehicle Drive Energy
channel-type.description: Accumulated drive energy of the vehicle.

channel-type.label: Vehicle Energy Consumption Efficiency
channel-type.description: Energy consumption efficiency of the vehicle.

channel-type.label: Vehicle Estimated Mileage
channel-type.description: Estimated mileage of current battery capacity.

channel-type.label: Vehicle Charge Cable Status
channel-type.description: Whether the charge cable is connected or not. 0: unconnected 1: connected

channel-type.label: Vehicle Charge Status
channel-type.description: Charging status of the vehicle. 1: non-charge mode 2: charging 3: charge completed 4: charging abort abnormally

channel-type.label: Vehicle Charge Voltage
channel-type.description: Charging voltage

channel-type.label: Vehicle Charge Current
channel-type.description: Charging current

channel-type.label: Vehicle Charge Remaining Time
channel-type.description: Remaining charging time

channel-type.label: Battery Pack Voltage
channel-type.description: Voltage of the battery pack

channel-type.label: Battery Pack Current
channel-type.description: Current of the battery pack

channel-type.label: Battery Pack Remaining Capacity
channel-type.description: Remaining capacity of the battery pack

channel-type.label: Battery Pack SOC
channel-type.description: SOC(state of charge) of the battery pack

channel-type.label: Battery Pack SOH
channel-type.description: SOH(state of health) of the battery pack

channel-type.label: Battery Cell MinVolt
channel-type.description: Minimum voltage of the battery module (with parallel connection of cells)

channel-type.label: Battery Cell MaxVolt
channel-type.description: Maximum voltage of the battery module (with parallel connection of cells)

channel-type.label: Battery Module MinTemp
channel-type.description: Minimum temperature of the battery module

channel-type.label: Battery Module MaxTemp
channel-type.description: Maximum temperature of the battery module

channel-type.label: Battery Connection Status
channel-type.description: Whether the battery is connected or not. 0: unconnected 1: connected

channel-type.label: MCU Voltage
channel-type.description: Voltage of the MCU(motor control unit)

channel-type.label: MCU Temperature
channel-type.description: Temperature of MCU(motor control unit)

channel-type.label: Motor Speed
channel-type.description: Rotational speed of the motor

channel-type.label: Motor Temperature
channel-type.description: Temperature of the motor

channel-type.label: Motor OT Warning
channel-type.description: Whether the motor is OT or not. 0: normal 1: OT warning

channel-type.label: MCU OT Warning
channel-type.description: Whether the MCU is OT or not. 0: normal 1: OT warning

channel-type.label: Battery Pack OT Warning
channel-type.description: Whether the battery pack is OT or not. 0: normal 1: OT warning

channel-type.label: MCU fault
channel-type.description: Status of MCU. 0: normal 1: level 1 minor fault 2: level 2 critical fault

channel-type.label: Motor Error
channel-type.description: Status of the battery pack. 0: normal 1: level D25 minor fault 2: level 2 critical fault
